meanings.definition: To come into view briefly or faintly
meanings.sent1: The ship was peering on the horizon before disappearing into the mist.
meanings.sent2: A smile was peering on her face as she reminisced about the happy memories.
meanings.sent3: Peering momentarily, the elusive fox darted back into the forest, leaving only a rustle behind.
